detail_desc: Off-the-shoulder jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with narrow shoulder straps and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and a decorative seam with glittery thread at the side.

Off-the-shoulder jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with narrow shoulder straps and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and a decorative seam with glittery thread at the side.

Off-the-shoulder jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with narrow shoulder straps and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and a decorative seam with glittery thread at the side.

Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with frills over the shoulders and long sleeves. Buttons at the back, cable-knit sections down the sleeves and at the front, and a flared skirt.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a fastening at the top, a lined hood with a pompom, and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft brushed inside.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a top and pair of trousers in sturdy, textured cotton jersey. Top with long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, buttons at the back of the neck and a straight hem with short slits in the sides. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in a soft wool blend with a hood, buttons down the front, concealed press-studs at the crotch and trimmed edges. Jersey lining.
Warm-lined ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.

Paper straw hat with a twisted band around the brim and paper straw pompom at one side. Width of brim 5 cm.
Hat in braided paper straw with an embroidered motif on the brim. Width of brim 12 cm.

Padded ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reinforced palms for a firmer grip. Imitation suede section at the thumbs, and ribbing and an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the top.

Water bottle in glass with a silicone grip, metal screw top and fabric strap. Capacity 400 ml.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in wide-wale organic cotton corduroy. Straps with adjustable buttoning at the front, an open chest pocket and elastication at the back of the waist. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y) and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
